      void delete(java.lang.Integer objectID)

      boolean hasOptionRestriction(java.lang.Integer configID)
      Whether the config has at least one option restriction
      java.util.List loadOptionsByConfigForRoles(java.lang.Integer configID, java.lang.Integer person, java.lang.Integer project)
      Loads all restricted options which are valid for the person and project given a configID If no restriction exists return null which means all the options from the list should be loaded If it returns an empty list, it means that all options are restricted
      java.lang.Integer save(Tconfigoptionsrole configoptionsrole)
      Saves a new/existing configOptionsRoleBean in the Tconfigoptionsrole table
